name: European Security Systems Association (ESSA) e. V.
goal: The purpose and functions of the European Security Systems Association e.V. is to improve and guarantee the quality of products, components and materials from the security systems, fire protection and life safety segments. Furthermore, the Association represents the joint economic, technical and scientific interests of the members vis-à-vis international and national business circles and authorities. Goal is to have a security market in Europe with common rules and without trade barriers.
interests: Banking and financial services, Borders and Security, Business and Industry, Foreign affairs and security policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade
euInitiatives: Trade policies, removal of non-tariff trade barriers, harmonisation of certification and testing in Europe, European Standardisation
